attributes.action: No convicted Paedophile,Terrorist,Murderer,Rapist,should be protected by the law
attributes.background: No convicted Paedophile, Terrorist, Murderer or Rapist should be protected by British Law, dispsite employment position or status, Tax payers should not have to pay tax to protect the people the tax payer needs protecting from.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
